website_summaries.verdict: If you are looking for a light-coverage foundation with at least SPF 20, this BB tinted moisturizer is one of tarte's top sellers.
pros: Provides light to medium coverage that is buildable without feeling heavy on the skin
Contains vitamins and Amazonian clay that nourish skin
Works well for all types of skin and doesn't contain oil
cons: Has some tiny reflective particles that resemble glitter, which some users may not like

customer_reviews.title: Really nice product
customer_reviews.text: Really like this tinted moisturizer. I've also used Intellishade, and this product provides a bit more coverage, which I appreciate because of splotchiness on my cheeks. It doesn't completely cover that, but it's good enough for the majority of my days. I have had a bit of breakouts, but I'm going to attribute that to a humid, hot summer and stress at work :)
customer_reviews.author: Kay West

customer_reviews.title: The Best I've Ever Used
customer_reviews.text: I just came to this product in the last year and I love it. You do not have to reapply and it looks like you aren't wearing make up. There is no line of demarkation either....Yahoo. AND, the cover is great.
customer_reviews.author: AAchie

customer_reviews.title: Just enough
customer_reviews.text: I dislike a "base" product - but this B&B is lightweight and more of a moisturizer - love it.
customer_reviews.author: Betty Sinor

customer_reviews.title: Perfection!
customer_reviews.text: I love this product! I’ll reorder when I run out!
customer_reviews.author: Lynne Swell

customer_reviews.title: Ordered incorrectly—my fault.
customer_reviews.text: Ordered wrong thing—too heavy for me—one of my girls took it.
customer_reviews.author: Terri Newsom

customer_reviews.title: The best
customer_reviews.text: The besttttt love this so much. Especially with my freckles
customer_reviews.author: Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Used this for years
customer_reviews.text: This is a splurge for me but I love the coverage I get with this product
customer_reviews.author: Arkmom

customer_reviews.title: Love this product
customer_reviews.text: Love this product. It is very light on the skin. Just want I need as most makeup sits on my skin and looks very fake
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great if you have sensitive skin..
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect for sensitive skin. I've had many problems trying to find a tinted moisturizer that wouldn't make me break out. This brand is the one.
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great for your skin. Love the lightweight feel it leaves on skin. Not too shiny or matte, just right.
customer_reviews.author: Beppie

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight but full coverage
customer_reviews.text: This is a great, lightweight product that makes your skin look flawless. I have oily skin and it didn’t budge by the end of the day and kept my skin smooth. I love that it has sunscreen in it.
customer_reviews.author: S.J. Cunningham

customer_reviews.title: AS CLOSE TO LIQUID SKIN YOU'LL FIND
customer_reviews.text: I went out of my way to write this, I'M A MAN, and I have slight redness, so I bought probably $500.00 of every type of BB cream, foundation, etc. THIS STUFF I'LL USE FOR THE REST OF MY LIFE, if you ever thought "Why can't they make a makeup that makes your skin perfect yet no one can tell you're wearing it, like liquid skin, THIS IS IT". I wear it every day, skin looks flawless and younger
customer_reviews.author: Michael Erickson

customer_reviews.title: Costly
customer_reviews.text: I really like this moisturizer, it covers nicely and looks very natural. I was surprised to find out Amazon priced it so high. Ulta had it priced almost 20 dollars less than Amazon. That's not my usual experience shopping online.
customer_reviews.author: Dory Liggett

customer_reviews.title: Great non-greasy moisturizer with a very subtle hint of illumination.
customer_reviews.text: I use LIGHT-MEDIUM BB Tinted Moisturizer I love that this tinted moisturizer does not settle in my fine wrinkles, it is light feeling and is not greasy. I apply a dab to the back of my hand, then use a drug store round-flat cosmetic sponge to spread evenly all over my face. It make my skin look fresh. If I need a touch of coverage, I apply second layer. When I want full coverage, its a great base to my Laura Geller Balance N Brighten. It also has the Very Slightest bit of brightening illumination, not a bright silver sparkle, which is why I love to wear it alone.
customer_reviews.author: Teekey

product_meta.title: Tarte Cosmetics Amazonian Clay BB Tinted Moisturizer Broad Spectrum SPF 20, Light-Medium
product_meta.description: Color: Light-Medium (light to medium w/ pink and yellow undertones) 1.7 oz
feature_bullets: Amazonian Clay BB Tinted Moisturizer Broad Spectrum SPF 20 Sunscreen is an oil-free, vegan tinted moisturizer that offers buildable coverage that blurs imperfections and protects skin with SPF 20 and antioxidant vitamins A, C, and E.

What the product does:Diffuses the look of fine lines and wrinkles while protecting skin from harmful UVA/UVB rays and providing buildable, light-to-medium coverage. The Amazonian Clay-powered formula features skin-comforting chamomile and antioxidant vitamins A, C, and E to nourish your complexion.

Skinvigorating Ingredients: Amazonian Clay: Nature's most perfect ingredient providing total skin balance for better, longer, truer wear. Vitamin E: Natural preservative that also acts as an anti-inflammatory emollient and protects against free radical damage. Vitamin A: Powerful antioxidant that prevents signs of aging while helping promote collagen production and moisture retention in the skin.

Chamomile Extract: Rich in essential oils, this natural plant extract is antiallergenic and anti-inflammatory, and has been known to treat and heal dry or damaged skin. Mineral pigments: colors and dyes derived from natural minerals have been known to soothe and soften skin. Broad Spectrum SPF 20 Sunscreen
